subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin St. Louis, the 39-year-old sharpshooter the Rangers acquired in a deadline deal last season, is becoming a role model for his teammates ahead of his first full season in New York.
snippet: Martin St. Louis, the 39-year-old sharpshooter the Rangers acquired in a deadline deal last season, is becoming a role model for his teammates ahead of his first full season in New York.
